plot: Alice is having a hard time getting ready for a funeral. Lucy, her girlfriend, is trying her best to help her, but the atmosphere is chill between them. Will a trip down memory lane help?
title: Dirty Orange
plot_es: Alice is having a hard time getting ready for a funeral. Lucy, her girlfriend, is trying her best to help her, but the atmosphere is chill between them. Will a trip down memory lane help?
plot_en: Alice is having a hard time getting ready for a funeral. Lucy, her girlfriend, is trying her best to help her, but the atmosphere is chill between them. Will a trip down memory lane help?
